attributes.action: Allow parents to remove children from school to prevent the spread of Covid19
attributes.additional_details: To increase the social distancing potential in schools and also remove as much as possible the threat of spread by children to vulnerable parents and grandparents who may be exposed to these children
attributes.background: Give parents the discretion to remove the children from school and encourage schools to provide work and assistance so that children can be taught from home if the family has the ability to do so.
